trends: There have been 32 other sightings in La Porte
There were no other sightings in La Porte on or around June 22nd 2010
divs: sighting detailsi was outside on the phone and hung up when i finished talking. i turned around and seen this sphere shaped object come out behind a tree across the street from me and casually gain height diagonally to above treetop level across the street from where it emerged from. at first sighting i was stunned with my "jaw opened" when i overcame my being stunned in disbelief of seeing this object, i then became excited. as it gained altitude i noticed it was not emiting any light and was sphere in shape with flame emiting from the bottom. the flame appeared to be steady at times for a couple of seconds and then pulsate and was approximately 1\8th inch in length. from its distance and altitude i am guessing it was aproximately 10 feet in diameter and had a crescent white form at the top. the object was mainly a dark gray in color. once above the trees it began an easterly dirction with about a 5 degree northern flight path and its rate of speed was slow around 5 to 10 miles per hour. i ran upstairs to grab my camera while it was still across the street from me and to tell my nephew (*name deleted--sgonzalez\cms)to come downstiars not only to see this for himself but to get help with his cell phone. when we got outside the object appeared as a small dot in the distance and perhaps 3 blocks away. (*name deleted--sgonzalez\cms)was still able to see the object as i pointed it out to him. my 35mm camera would not function. i could not take any pictures of the object until it was no longer visible, it was only then that my camera began to function normally again.
Summary: Object was just above treetop level emiting flame.
